QuestData.Title: The "Jinyu Princess" Irrigation System
QuestData.Description: <The back of the box features a caricature of a jinyu maiden surrounded by marketing copy.>$B$B"Hey there, greenthumb. Are you pouting over parched pumpkins? Crying over crusty cabbage? Are your leeks lame and your melons melancholy?$B$BThen it's time you brought home the Jinyu Princess! She'll wash over your garden like a sweet spring rain, dousing that drought with a deep draught of..."$B$B<It goes on like this for six paragraphs.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the "Jinyu Princess" Irrigation System to Farmer Yoon at Sunsong Ranch or Halfhill market.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Bring the "Jinyu Princess" Irrigation System to Farmer Yoon at Sunsong Ranch or Halfhill Market.
